Amobeous/Nemesis Enforcer/Koga Shuko/Ramhorn/Scattershot:


Amobeous, a in a voice only another microscopic "creature" could hear, he 
replied to Bacterium's sound questions.  "I honestly don't know.  For now, 
I'm going to sit it out.  I've been hearing exteremely loud booms and other 
noises.  I think we should just wait a day or two.  Things will have to be 
cleared up by then."

=============

Nemesis landed next to Zardus, his optic lasers charged fully just in case 
the Maximal Liono Prime tried anything.

=============

Koga Shuko activated his com to Set.  <Set, get back to base.  We will 
regroup.  I wish to reveal a card I've had up my sleeve for a while...>

=============

Beachcomber slowly crept back to the Ark.  Activating a comlink to it, he 
began to ask questions.  <Hello, hello?  Anyone there?  This is the Maximal 
Beachcomber.  I want to know if it's safe to come inside.  Please respond, 
over>

=============

Scattershot landed, perching himself in a tree.  "Scattershot, transform." he 
whispered, going into robot mode and slamming into the ground feet first.  
Motioning to DevilDuer, he approached Ultra Optimus crashed ship slowly, 
automatic rifle raised.
